  const vowels = ['a', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u', 'y', 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U', 'Y']
  const consonants = ['b', 'c', 'd', 'f', 'g', 'h', 'j', 'k', 'l','m', 'n', 'p', 'q', 'r','s', 't', 'v', 'w', 'x', 'z']
  const wordLength = word.length
  let closestVowel = ''
  let closestVowelDistance = Infinity
  for (let i = wordLength - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
    const vowel = word[i]
    const consonant = word[i + 1]
    if (vowels.indexOf(vowel)!== -1 && consonants.indexOf(consonant)!== -1) {
      const distance = Math.abs(vowel.charCodeAt(0) - consonant.charCodeAt(0))
      if (distance < closestVowelDistance) {
        closestVowel = vowel
        closestVowelDistance = distance
      }
    }
  }
  return closestVowel
}
